directions: Roast the cacao beans in an oven at 250°F (120°C) for 20-25 minutes, until they become fragrant and crack open.
Remove the beans from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Crack the beans open and separate the nibs from the shells.
Grind the cacao nibs in a food processor or grinder until they form a paste.
In a separate bowl, mix the sugar and cocoa butter together until well combined.
Combine the cacao paste with the sugar and cocoa butter mixture.
Blend the mixture in a food processor until it becomes a fine, powdery consistency.
Store the cocoa powder in an airtight container.
